name: Billiards Pool Night Club
description:
Billiards Pool Night Club is a popular pool game across the world, pocket all your solids and the black ball to win the game! Follows the basic rules of 8 Ball pool game, game is easy to learn together and it needs your challenging skills to conquer all the stages! Every level is a preset surprising challenge, players will get to win each challenge after pocketing all the solid-colored balls within limited time or cues.
Features:
- Intuitive controls
- Easy & quick guide practices
- Full high quality 3D textured environments
- Beautiful display, smooth
- Levels for challenges
- Win more scores by making combos
